content: 14 single_crochet row 2 chain 1 turn single_crochet across to last 2 sts decrease over last 2 sts 13 single_crochet row 3 turn do not chain 1 decrease single_crochet across 12 single_crochet row 4 chain 1 turn single_crochet in nx 2 single_crochet half_double_crochet in nx st double_crochet in nx st treble_crochet picot treble_crochet in nx st double_crochet in nx st half_double_crochet in nx st single_crochet in nx st double_crochet in nx st treble_crochet picot treble_crochet in nx st double_crochet in nx st slip_stitch in last st fo weave in end working across foundation row join black with slip_stitch in first chain chain 1 holding prepared pipe cleaner against fr single_crochet over pipe cleaner in each chain across fo leaving a long end for sewing cut pipe cleaner to 1 of wing insert pipe cleaner into pumpkin and sew wing to pumpkin with yarn end weave in ends finishing cut jack-o-lantern face out of black felt and sew or glue to pumpkin body copyright melanie blake 2008 page 4 mama24boyz s tips and techniques single_crochet single_crochet insert hook in next st draw up a lp yo draw through both lps on hook to complete stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet yo insert hook in nx st or space draw up a lp 3 lps on hook yo and draw through all 3 lps on hook to complete stitch beg - beginning chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet yo insert hook in nx st or space draw up a lp 3 lps on hook yo draw through 2 lps on hook twice to complete stitch decrease - single_crochet decrease insert hook in st indicated draw up a lp insert hook in nx st draw up a lp 3 lps on hook yo draw through last 3 lps on hook to complete stitch lp s - loop s repeat - repeat round - round nx - next rs - right side facing you skip - skip st s stitch es slip_stitch - slip_stitch space s space s decrease - together ws - wrong side facing you hd decrease - half_double_crochet decrease yo insert hook in st indicated draw up a lp yo and insert hook in nx st draw up a lp yo draw through last 5 lps on hook to complete stitch double_crochet decrease - double_crochet decrease yo insert hook in st indicated draw up a lp yo and draw through 2 lps on hook yo insert hook in nx st draw up a lp yo draw through 2 lps on hook 3 lps on hook yo and draw through last 3 lps on hook to complete stitch flo - front loop only insert hook in front lp of nx st as indicated blo - back loop insert hook in back loop of nx st as indicated yo yarn over fr foundation row fo fasten_off *to make a neater edge on your finished piece work your beginning row in the back ridge of your foundation chain *to make weaving in ends easier wherever you can
